name: The Statement of Randolph Carter (luwis, UltraShiko, Binong)
name_original: The Statement of Randolph Carter (luwis, UltraShiko, Binong)
description:
An occultist's pupil has been arrested following his disappearance. His testimony haunts you, driving you to crack the case.

After the disappearance of the mad professor, Harley Warren, his understudy, Randolph Carter, has been taken into custody for first degree murder. However, after a haunting testimony from Randolph, something doesn't feel right.

Taking the reins of an upstart detective, you decide to look more into the disappearance and follow the clues left by the zany Randolph. You will find clues, cryptic messages stored in cassette tapes, and even enter the massive Cypress Swamp in the dead of night. 

But can you crack the case? Is this all for nothing? Or are some mysteries best left to go unsolved?

Content Warning

This game contains gore, flashing lights, loud noises, and jumpscares that some may find disturbing. It may not be suitable for children and individuals with heart conditions or other medical conditions. Viewer discretion is strongly advised.

The "Statement of Randolph Carter" is a visual novel based on H.P Lovecraft's short story of the same name. This game is made in a month for the Spooktober Visual Novel Jam 2022.
